post_detail.description:
Challenge: 
ClickFireMedia was challenged to create a microsite for the launch of Mariah Carey’s new fragrance line, “Lollipop Bling.”
Execution: 
CFM created an interactive guilt-free candy wonderland inspired by Mariah’s NYC hometown skyline to introduce the launch of Lollipop Bling--her new trio of delightful sugary-scented fragrances. We also developed interactive digital engagements with social media integration to increase awareness, buzz, site traffic (new and returning), and site stickiness.
post_detail.title: Mariah Carey Lollipop Bling
